name: tm23
effect: Teaches Iron Tail to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Smack Down to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Iron Tail Gen I: Dragon Rage)

flavor_text.black_white: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it’s hit.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it’s hit.
